characterDescription:
The scout was a lighteyed woman of a caravan on the Shattered Plains whom Shallan encountered on her own trek across the Plains.
She identified the party that was pursuing Shallan as deserters.
Macob later identified her as his associate.

characterDetails.Appearance:
She was of medium height and had a wiry build. She wore trousers and a long coat that almost looked like a dress, buckled at the waist. She wore a tan glove over her safehand, and spoke Alethi without an accent.
After the battle with bandits, she was haggard and bloodstained.
